title: Dunno if this is a bug
body: so enemy {{champion:81}} has {{item:3026}}  ults right as i kill him and his ult still goes off while revivng dunno if this is a bug or if  its a thing

replies.body: The only thing that stops his ult from casting is being killed, so technically it is not a bug, but probably not intended.
thanks for that wasnt too sure
